New Records: South Africa's Heinrich Klaasen and David Miller put on a match-winning 75 runs partnership
Key Match Events: Jaker Ali was caught by Aiden Markram on the straight boundary trying to hit the six that would win it for Bangladesh
Mahmudullah was caught by Aiden Markram, and Taskin Ahmed needed to hit the last ball for six to win
Taskin Ahmed couldn't hit the last ball for six to win
Bangladesh were robbed of four leg byes that had ricocheted away off Mahmudullah's pads
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh deserved better, especially Towhid Hridoy, who had held everything together with his fine 37
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of a large crowd of Bangladeshi- Americans living in New York, with approximately 25,000 in attendance
